title: S1 EP1: Who Killed The Fashion Critic? Feat Julie Zerbo & Emilia Petrarca
itunes:title: Who Killed The Fashion Critic? Feat. Julie Zerbo & Emilia Petrarca
description: In our first episode, we speak with The Fashion Law’s Julie Zerbo and New York Mag; The Cut’s Emilia Petrarca about what it means to be critical of fashion in a world where everyone’s opinion has a platform. This episode takes a real look at the shortcomings of modern fashion journalism and why it is important to remain knowledgeable and critical of the fashion industry today.
